00044 class CurrentHeap
00045 {
00046 public:
00047         static int curHeap;
00048 };
00049 
00050 void printHeaps();
00051 
00052 #define CURLEVEL 200
00053 //2147483647
00054 
00055 #undef ASSERT
00056 #define ASSERT(b) { if (!(b)) { printf("Assert Error (%s,%d)!!!!\n", __FILE__, __LINE__); exit(0); } }
00057 
00058 #define DEBUGINF(level, x) if ((level)>=CURLEVEL) { printHeaps(); printf("Debug %s(%d): %s\n", __FILE__, __LINE__, x); } else { }
00059 
00060 #define DEBUGINFO(x) DEBUGINF(10, (x));
00061 #define DEBUGINFON DEBUGINFO("")

00066 class BlockDebug
00067 {
00068 private:
00069         char *info;
00070         char *filename;
00071         int linenumber;
00072         int lev;
00073 public:
00074         BlockDebug(const char *filename, int linenumber, int level)
00075         {
00076                 setinfo(filename, linenumber, "", level);
00077         }
00078         BlockDebug(const char *filename, int linenumber, const char * info, int level)
00079         {
00080                 setinfo(filename, linenumber, info, level);
00081         }
00082         ~BlockDebug()
00083         {
00084                 if (lev >= CURLEVEL)
00085                 {
00086                         --CurrentHeap::curHeap;
00087                         printHeaps();
00088                         printf("Leave Block %s(%d): %s\n", filename, linenumber, info);
00089                 }
00090                 delete[] filename;
00091                 delete[] info;
00092         }
00093 private:
00094         void setinfo(const char *fn, int ln, const char *str, int level)
00095         {
00096                 filename = new char[strlen(fn) + 1];
00097                 strcpy(filename, fn);
00098                 linenumber = ln;
00099                 info = new char[strlen(str) + 1];
00100                 strcpy(info, str);
00101                 lev = level;
00102                 if (lev >= CURLEVEL)
00103                 {
00104                         printHeaps();
00105                         //printf("Enter Block %s(%d): %s\n", filename, linenumber, str);
00106                         printf("Enter Block %s(%d): %s\n", filename, linenumber, str);
00107                         ++CurrentHeap::curHeap;
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 };
